DOC.brief_summary: EBUS-TBNA specimen are used for lung cancer diagnosing and staging, as well for molecular analysis. The purpose of this study is to evaluate if samples from on lymph node site can be divided for diagnosis and molecular analysis.
DOC.brief_title: Endobronchial Ultrasound-transbronchial Needle Aspiration (EBUS-TBNA) Sample Division
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of lung cancer enlarged mediastinal or hilar lymph nodes (>10 mm)
